General.Name: Griñó Ecologic S.A
General.Description: Griñó Ecologic, S.A. provides environmental and waste treatment services in Spain. Its provides environmental services, including custom, collection, and transportation; high pressure industrial cleaning; and management of urban and industrial waste. The company also operates waste treatment centers that offer transfer, sorting and recycling, composting, fuel production, disposal, and hazardous waste and energy recovery services. In addition, it generates energy from waste through energy recovery, diesel recovery, and gas plants. Griñó Ecologic, S.A. was founded in 1933 and is based in Lleida, Spain. Griñó Ecologic, S.A. is a subsidiary of Corporació Griñó, S.L.
